When presenting data, a beautiful table can be an impactful way of getting your ideas across.

One of my favorite articles by the wonderful David Keyes of R for the Rest of Us is this one, [How to Make Beautiful Tables in R](https://rfortherestofus.com/2019/11/how-to-make-beautiful-tables-in-r), that I often referenced when I was starting off in data analysis and reporting in R. It opened my world up to a host of packages that I didn't know existed, and made it very apparent that R users were very fortunate to have a variety of tools for making beautiful display tables for their reports, dashboards, etc.
